entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Wingham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:26 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 9:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -6.5°C
Wind: WNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Snow at times heavy beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets changing to ice pellets or periods of light snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High plus 2. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
